20: וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>And say ye</n> גַּ֗ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>moreover</n> הִנֵּ֛ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עַבְדְּךָ֥ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>Behold thy servant</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> אַחֲרֵ֑ינוּ <sup>310 </sup> <n>[is] behind us</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמַ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>For he said</n> אֲכַפְּרָ֣ה <sup>3722 </sup> <n>I will appease</n> פָנָ֗יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>him</n> בַּמִּנְחָה֙ <sup>4503 </sup> <n>with the present</n> הַהֹלֶ֣כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that goeth</n> לְפָנָ֔י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before me</n> וְאַחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>and afterward</n> כֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> אֶרְאֶ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I will see</n> פָנָ֔יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> אוּלַ֖י <sup>194 </sup> <n>perhaps</n> יִשָּׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>peradventure he will accept</n> פָנָֽי׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of me</n>
21: וַתַּעֲבֹ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>over</n> הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>the present</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>before</n> פָּנָ֑יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before him</n> וְה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> לָ֥ן <sup>3885 </sup> <n>and himself lodged</n> בַּלַּֽיְלָה־ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>that night</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>in the company</n>

23: וַיִּקָּחֵ֔ם <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And he took them</n> וַיַּֽעֲבִרֵ֖ם <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and sent them over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנָּ֑חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>the brook</n> וַֽיַּעֲבֵ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and sent over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whatever</n> לוֹ׃

27: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> שְּׁמֶ֑ךָ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>he</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n>
28: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall no</n> יַעֲקֹב֙ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>no more Jacob</n> יֵאָמֵ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>shall be called</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> שִׁמְךָ֔ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>Thy name</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>but</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>but Israel</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׂרִ֧יתָ <sup>8280 </sup> <n>for as a prince hast thou power</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֱלֹהִ֛ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>with God</n> וְעִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>and with</n> אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַתּוּכָֽל׃ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>and hast prevailed</n>
